title: Here, have a Leona art!
body:
Been practicing painting recently, because unlike my fellow Riot artists, I'm not the best at it. But in celebration of the new S&A board..

..have a slightly sad looking Leona practice portrait!

replies.body: For some reason I get the feeling that the rest of this image is Diana asleep with her head in Leona's lap, and Leona's just sitting there with that look on her face while she pets Diana's head...

Well I am not much knowledgeable in lore but should not she be cutting her head off instead?

As Diana killed Leona's clan elders (though she had every right imo).
They were friends before that, Also Leona is probably a freaking Saint, so she probably bugs Diana about if she is eating well while they are having epic life or death battles,

> They were friends before that, Also Leona is probably a freaking Saint, so she probably bugs Diana about if she is eating well while they are having epic life or death battles,

"You look so pale these days, Diana, it worries me... you really should get some more sun."

"....."

"Oh. Whoopsie daisy."
I see.
Well now I have a pesky case of the feels..

I have to say, she looks so *real*. As in she is an actual person you put on a painting. It also looks better than what I'd do.

http://fc07.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/266/0/c/weird_picture_by_rew711-d808on4.jpg
It's awesome! :D It's better than what I'd do.

I prefer Diana dead, after the tragic battle. With Leona remorsefully stroking her miss understood oponents head. 

Needs battle damage tho.
You want my waifu to kill my other waifu? I KILL YOU!
SILENCE!
[Or Maybe this one...](http://fc04.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2014/218/3/6/leona_diana___twilight_fades_by_dragonbreath7575-d7tzsbq.jpg)

Ironstylus your Leona and Diana artworks are always so beautiful and realistic.
Could you create a Quinn art just for one time? I think it could be just as beautiful and I would really love it ^^ {{champion:133}}
All of my yes, Ironstylus pls!

IronStylus baby, did you forget about the Syndra portrait?

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=49359639#49359639

Really good Leona portrait though, I really like her hair.
Woo the orange hair is perfect! {{champion:89}}
The look on Leona face after her ADC tower dives level 2.
Gorgeous image, though I can't help wondering if her features have changed significantly from her original splash art. Maybe it's just circumstantial, idk.

Just beautiful :) ,lovely ,contemplating the battles of the day ,how i wished i could draw like you.
But here is my pic of Iron Solari Leo anyways :),http://i.gyazo.com/d7f20f138c029bfc02f43248bf26fd34.png
pls notice me senpai XD

Very nice. This is very inspiring! I can see Leona brooding about Diana and the whole Lunari/Solari affair.

Keep up the good work!

"Fanfiction, **fanart**, champion concepts, and other lovely things like that should NOT be posted here."

What the fuck IronStylus, are you above the law or something?
Ironstylus isn't technically a fan.
Holy Solari, this is awesome
Haunting

For some reason this makes me think of Miriel from Fire Emblem: Awakening.

"Inconceivable..."
Pretty sorrowful look. Reminds me of that fan art of Janna looking at Arthas and crying.
Jaina*. LOL, Janna. Though I suppose Jaina could leave people breathless for $2.95 a minute with that mass teleport of hers =P
Parrot seems to only be allegedly bad at painting.
Awesome work dude! Teach me Iron-senpai

"im not the best at it" haha right xD
but your practice is more then most C:
What program did you use for this? Did you use a drawing tablet? I really like the loosely painted art style.
Leona = hottest ginger NA

> Leona = hottest ginger NA

Most beautiful ginger NA :)
She doesn't look sad, she looks exhausted. Like she's been doing this (Whatever 'this" is) for way too long.
wow, it's so awesome <3
Yes, all hail the parrot! .... but where is Diana!!! we can't have a Sad Leona without a mildly amused Diana, now can we?? {{champion:131}} !!!!!

> Yes, all hail the parrot! .... but where is Diana!!! we can't have a Sad Leona without a mildly amused Diana, now can we?? {{champion:131}} !!!!!

The moon will prevail.
Requesting Riven please, preferably smiling.

I'd imagine that this is the saddest Leona can get over something. She probably goes from sad -> accepting the situation/doing something about the problem pretty quickly. So can we have a determined portrait of her next, Parrotman?
Leona upon realizing that with Diana as her mortal enemy, sh now has to brush all her hair on her own, or get a buzz cut,
Very nice, love the light shading on her hair ;) Is it true that Leona resembels your wife?

Yes and not-quite-but-yes. http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=21037689#21037689

Though the fact that her appearance and personality were heavily drawn from Mrs. Stylus makes wonder how you react to Leona being subjected to....Rule 34.
